## Create EML

* [Read and Write Ecological Metadata Language Files â€¢ rOpenSci: EML](https://docs.ropensci.org/EML/#a-minimal-valid-eml-document)

```{r}
me <- list(
  individualName = list(
    givenName = "Ben", surName = "Best"))
my_eml <- list(
  dataset = list(
    title = "A Minimal Valid EML Dataset",
    creator = me,
    contact = me))

eml_xml <- here("data/eml_example.xml")
write_eml(my_eml, eml_xml)

eml_validate(eml_xml)
```

## Read EML

```{r}
eml_raw <- readLines(eml_xml) %>% 
  paste(collapse = "\n")
```

```xml
`r eml_raw`
```
